translations: n.鼬，黄鼠狼；<非正式>狡猾的人（weasel 的复数）
v.逃避，推诿（weasel 的第三人称单数形式）

phrs.translation: 乘精明细心的人麻痹不备欺骗他

sentences.sentence: The weasels will trust entirely their excellent sentinels.
sentences.translation: 黄鼠狼将完全信任他们优秀的哨兵。

sentences.sentence: They were Weasels, small animals very fond of both eggs and chickens.
sentences.translation: 它们是黄鼠狼，一种非常喜欢鸡蛋和鸡的小动物。

sentences.sentence: He found out I was innocent when I caught the Weasels and he let me go.
sentences.translation: 当我抓住那些黄鼠狼时，他发现我是无辜的，就放了我。
